report.title: Sweet Sleep
report.author: Eazy E
report.bodytext: I have used Remeron a lot to help me sleep. It helps some with depression although I found that meditating and praying to God helped my depression more. /n /n Anyways, here is what I have experienced on remeron. /n /n First of all crazy dreams, very intense and vivid. /n /n Some cravings for sweets when on it, it makes me hungry sometimes. /n /n When I started taking it the remeron makes me sleep for like 24 hours straight.
